GJ=#{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE1=#{define1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE2=#{define2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE3=#{define3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFINE4=#{define4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select data_id, tfm_type_id, type_code, type_name, parent_id, parent_code, is_parent, type_index, SQH, SQRI, FMMC, ZHY, GKH, GKR, WXLX, SHENQR, FMR, SQRDZ, DLR, DLJG, GBDM, IPCFLH, CPCFLH, LJNFLH, YXQH, YXQR, DQFLZT, FLZTLSXX, FLZTGGRQ, FLZTYJ, FLZTEJ, SHOUQR, SQGGH, ZSH, ZLQR, ZLH, QLYQ, ZLPDF, SCYJTZSFWR, SCYJDFR, SCYJBZR, BZTZFFWR, BHTZSFWR, FSQQR, FSSLFWR, DFGCWJ, SQBZ, RKSJ, GMJJHYML, GMJJHYDL, GMJJHYZL, ZXCYYJ, ZXCYEJ, ZXCYSJ, BYZCS, BFMRYYCS, BSCYYYCS, ZYCS, TYCS, SQRDM, JGHDMC, JSWTHYYXG, FMDHHXFA, YT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, REMARKS, STATUS, GJ, DEFINE1, DEFINE2, DEFINE3, DEFINE4 from index_out_patent where 1=1
and data_id like '%${dataId}%'
and tfm_type_id like '%${tfmTypeId}%'
and type_code like '%${typeCode}%'
and type_name like '%${typeName}%'
and parent_id like '%${parentId}%'
and parent_code like '%${parentCode}%'
and is_parent like '%${isParent}%'
and type_index like '%${typeIndex}%'
and SQH like '%${sqh}%'
and SQRI like '%${sqri}%'
and FMMC like '%${fmmc}%'
and ZHY like '%${zhy}%'
and GKH like '%${gkh}%'
and GKR like '%${gkr}%'
and WXLX like '%${wxlx}%'
and SHENQR like '%${shenqr}%'
and FMR like '%${fmr}%'
and SQRDZ like '%${sqrdz}%'
and DLR like '%${dlr}%'
and DLJG like '%${dljg}%'
and GBDM like '%${gbdm}%'
and IPCFLH like '%${ipcflh}%'
and CPCFLH like '%${cpcflh}%'
and LJNFLH like '%${ljnflh}%'
and YXQH like '%${yxqh}%'
and YXQR like '%${yxqr}%'
and DQFLZT like '%${dqflzt}%'
and FLZTLSXX like '%${flztlsxx}%'
and FLZTGGRQ like '%${flztggrq}%'
and FLZTYJ like '%${flztyj}%'
and FLZTEJ like '%${flztej}%'
and SHOUQR like '%${shouqr}%'
and SQGGH like '%${sqggh}%'
and ZSH like '%${zsh}%'
and ZLQR like '%${zlqr}%'
and ZLH like '%${zlh}%'
and QLYQ like '%${qlyq}%'
and ZLPDF like '%${zlpdf}%'
and SCYJTZSFWR like '%${scyjtzsfwr}%'
and SCYJDFR like '%${scyjdfr}%'
and SCYJBZR like '%${scyjbzr}%'
and BZTZFFWR like '%${bztzffwr}%'
and BHTZSFWR like '%${bhtzsfwr}%'
and FSQQR like '%${fsqqr}%'
and FSSLFWR like '%${fsslfwr}%'
and DFGCWJ like '%${dfgcwj}%'
and SQBZ like '%${sqbz}%'
and RKSJ like '%${rksj}%'
and GMJJHYML like '%${gmjjhyml}%'
and GMJJHYDL like '%${gmjjhydl}%'
and GMJJHYZL like '%${gmjjhyzl}%'
and ZXCYYJ like '%${zxcyyj}%'
and ZXCYEJ like '%${zxcyej}%'
and ZXCYSJ like '%${zxcysj}%'
and BYZCS like '%${byzcs}%'
and BFMRYYCS like '%${bfmryycs}%'
and BSCYYYCS like '%${bscyyycs}%'
and ZYCS like '%${zycs}%'
and TYCS like '%${tycs}%'
and SQRDM like '%${sqrdm}%'
and JGHDMC like '%${jghdmc}%'
and JSWTHYYXG like '%${jswthyyxg}%'
and FMDHHXFA like '%${fmdhhxfa}%'
and YT like '%${yt}%'
and CREATE_DATE like '%${createDate}%'
and CREATE_USER_ID like '%${createUserId}%'
and REMARKS like '%${remarks}%'
and STATUS like '%${status}%'
and GJ like '%${gj}%'
and DEFINE1 like '%${define1}%'
and DEFINE2 like '%${define2}%'
and DEFINE3 like '%${define3}%'
and DEFINE4 like '%${define4}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
